name: The Forest Trails
description:
You are a princess from the Peace Kingdom, but... You seemed more interested in visiting the forest near the castle? What will happen to you when your first encounter is a big scary wolf!?

(This is a translated version from a game I made for a workshop called "Bitsy para chicas" and it was made in 3 hours. If you speak Spanish as well, you can check it out).

Hope you enjoy my first game!

Azula💙
